title: How to be awesome on Twitter in 5 steps
text:
How to be awesome on Twitter in 5 steps 
Published By: Macworld.com - Today 
The great thing about Twitter is it’s a way to get a peek into someone else’s stream of consciousness. It’s a way to eavesdrop on some...
